mapper.select: SELECT MEM_IMG AS MEM_IMG, MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW F WHERE F.MEM_ING_CD= D.MEM_CD) AS FOL_ING_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW F WHERE F.MEM_ED_CD= D.MEM_CD) AS FOL_ED_CNT, NVL(D.MEM_INTRO,'자기소개가 없습니다.') AS MEM_INTRO FROM MEMBER_DATA D WHERE D.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
